name: Rin Finance Coin
description: Rin Finance Coin is the native or underlying and governance currency of the Rin 2D and 3D games arcade. This arcade will have several games of different genres to capture and entertain the masses while earning. Built on the BSC, the coin gives holders access to games in the Rin arcade, allowing holders to play several games and earn more tokens or other in-game rewards which can be traded in the inbuilt NFT marketplace. We also aim to integrate several other prominent tokens with solid tokenomics, proven stability and reliability as well as functional management to our games arcade, giving usability to several cryptocurrency projects while expanding the reach of cryptocurrency in general to reach the masses
